title: The Alpha Podcasting Association
itunes:title: The Alpha Podcasting Association
description:
Who's in your corner as you run your business? If you're still hanging around people who play small or fake, ego-driven "influencers," you need a better network. It can be tough to figure out who to take advice from at first, but the real killers always manage to rise to the top…
 
The men of the Alpha Podcasting Association all share a common set of values that has landed them where they are, first and foremost a dedication to honesty, connections based on real relationships and a willingness to get in the trenches and do the work. With decades upon decades of experience between them, the chance to be a fly on the wall when they get together is a coveted opportunity.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach brings in the group of creators that make up the Alpha Podcasting Association Mastermind to share their insights on the insane growth that comes from having a network of high-level entrepreneurs who are dedicated to lifting each other up, pulling away from the fakes with a mix of consistency and straight-up hard work, and under-the-radar social media strategies for growing your business. This is not your average interview - tune in for an outrageous amount of insight from half a dozen true badasses.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/alpha-podcasting-association
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
